item.title: CSS cheatsheet
item.description: Hi, this is a must have javascript cheatsheet if you wanna learn quick, and save you time of googling… Dimensions Megapixels 1,920 x 1,080 2.1MP 3,264 x 2,448 8MP 4,288 x 3,216 14MP 0a bbb c0 1 2vvbvvcbcvbvcbcvbvcbcvbcv 3 4 5 6 `foo` | Tables | Are | Cool | |----------|:-------------:|------:| | col 1 is | left-aligned | $1600 | | col 2 is | centered | $12 | | col 3 is | right-aligned | $1 |
